DOC.brief_summary: This study assessed the efficacy and safety of Avastin in combination with docetaxel and cisplatin as first-line treatment of patients with metastatic or locally advanced non-small cell lung cancer. Patients received Avastin 15 mg/kg intravenously (IV), docetaxel 75 mg/m^2, and cisplatin 75 mg/m^2 on Day 1 of each 3-week cycle for a maximum of 6 cycles.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Combination With Docetaxel and Cisplatin in Patients With Metastatic or Locally Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
